func_sig.description: Convert a decimal number to a specified base and return its representation as a string.
func_sig.name: convert_decimal_to_base

base.description: The base to convert to (must be greater than 1).

func_sig.description: Find the last digit of a number when presented in a specified base.
func_sig.name: find_last_digit_in_base

base.description: The base in which to find the last digit.

number.description: The number to find the last digit of.

func_sig.description: Convert a decimal (including repeating) string to a simplified fraction and returns the numerator and denominator.
func_sig.name: convert_decimal_to_fraction

decimal_string.description: The decimal representation, can be repeating, like '0.42' or '0.42̅'

func_sig.description: Calculate the sum of distinct remainders of squares of integers in a specified range when divided by a given modulus.
func_sig.name: calculate_distinct_remainders_sum

func_sig.description: Calculate the remainder of a number after division by a divisor.
func_sig.name: calculate_remainder

number.description: The number to perform modulo operation on.

func_sig.description: Calculate the remainder and quotient of a number when divided by a modulus.
func_sig.name: remainder_and_quotient
